channel.title: ffmpeg on Don't Judge
channel.description: Recent content in ffmpeg on Don't Judge

item.title: ffmpeg 命令记录
item.description: 格式转换+网络优化 for %a in (*.*) do ffmpeg -i "%a" -movflags faststart -acodec copy -vcodec copy "out%~na.mp4" *.*,默认合并该路径下所有文件 ts 分块合并 ffmpeg -i "concat:1.ts|2.ts|3.ts|4.ts" -acodec copy -vcodec copy -absf aac_adtstoasc output.mp4 加密 ts 合并 https://blog.csdn.net/zmjames2000/article/details/102770272 ffmpeg -allowed_extensions ALL -i index.m3u8 -c copy out.mp4 串
